name: Critical Thinking
description: Analyze information objectively and make reasoned judgments.

levels.title: Questioning Assumptions
levels.objective: Identify and challenge your own biases.
levels.description: Learn to spot cognitive biases and ask probing questions.
practices: Identify one assumption you made today and question it
Play 'Devil's Advocate' with your own ideas
List facts vs. opinions in a news article

levels.title: Analyzing Arguments
levels.objective: Evaluate the strength and validity of arguments.
levels.description: Learn logical fallacies and how to construct sound arguments.
practices: Identify logical fallacies in a debate or discussion
Structure a written argument with premises and conclusion

levels.title: Strategic Decision Making
levels.objective: Make high-quality decisions based on analysis.
levels.description: Use decision-making frameworks to solve complex problems.
practices: Use a decision matrix for a personal choice
Review a past decision to improve your process
